services.name: Matrix
services.short_description: Matrix is an open network for secure, decentralized communication.
services.long_description: Private.coffee runs a Matrix server. You can use it to chat with other people at Private.coffee or around the world. Use it with a client of your choice, with https://matrix.private.coffee as the homeserver, or use our web client.

services.name: CryptPad
services.long_description: CryptPad is a private, encrypted, zero-knowledge, realtime collaborative editor, similar to Google Docs and Office 365.

services.name: Invidious
services.short_description: Watch YouTube videos without Google tracking.
services.long_description: Invidious is an alternative front-end to YouTube. It allows you to watch YouTube videos without Google tracking you.

services.name: Mastodon
services.short_description: Mastodon is a decentralized social network.
services.long_description: Mastodon is a decentralized social network. You can use it to post short messages, follow other people, and more.

services.name: GotHub
services.short_description: Alternative GitHub interface that respects privacy.
services.long_description: Gothub is an alternative GitHub interface that respects your privacy. It is currently in alpha, but you can browse and download repositories, and you can also clone them using git+https (although the text on the main page would disagree).

services.name: redlib
services.short_description: redlib is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Reddit.
services.long_description: redlib is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Reddit. It allows you to browse Reddit without being tracked.

services.name: AllTube
services.short_description: Download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and more.
services.long_description: AllTube is a video downloader powered by yt-dlp. It allows you to download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and many other sites. You can also stream the download through our server for extra privacy.

services.name: Structables
services.long_description: Structables allows you to browse Instructables without being tracked.

services.name: NocoDB
services.short_description: NocoDB is a self-hosted alternative to Airtable.
services.long_description: NocoDB is a self-hosted alternative to Airtable. It allows you to create databases and tables, and to view and edit them in a spreadsheet-like interface. (Note: If you are unable to create tables upon registration, simply wait a minute or two, log out and then log in again.)

services.name: Penpot
services.short_description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform.
services.long_description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform. It allows you to create designs and prototypes, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: YOURLS
services.short_description: URL shortener for creating handy links.
services.long_description: Use our URL shortener at private.cf to turn long, complicated URLs into something more handy.

services.name: Rallly
services.short_description: Rallly is a free collaborative scheduling service for voting and polls.
services.long_description: Rallly is a free collaborative scheduling service. It allows you to create polls and vote on them, similar to Doodle.

services.name: LibreY
services.long_description: LibreY is an open-source, privacy-friendly metasearch engine. It allows you to search for web, image, video, torrents, and more, and it can also search onion sites.

services.name: Overleaf
services.short_description: Overleaf is an online LaTeX editor for writing and sharing documents.
services.long_description: Overleaf is an online LaTeX editor for writing and sharing documents. It allows you to write documents in LaTeX, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: Nitter
services.short_description: Nitter is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Twitter.
services.long_description: Nitter is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Twitter. It allows you to browse Twitter without being tracked. Currently not working so well.

services.name: Proxigram
services.short_description: Proxigram is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Instagram.
services.long_description: Proxigram is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Instagram. It allows you to browse Instagram without being tracked.
